name: Road Trip JAM
description:
(This game was made for the Major Jam 3: Retro 2020 Game Jam)

In this road trip game, you have to click the key displayed on screen as fast as possible! There's 10 vehicles/costumes to collec! You can earn costumes by getting a certain amount of points.

This game uses a 64x64 resolution!

Music by Cade Conkle

Artwork by Me

Sound Effects by Scratch
